entries.name: noQuestForYouYet
entries.text: Can I get you something from the bar?

children.name: noThanks
children.response: Suit yourself, but you can come back and talk to me any time.

entries.name: questCompleted
entries.text: Hang on to that gold ingot I gave you. It may come in handy in the future. Like, it just might unlock a chest on a later step of the main quest.

children.name: needHelp
children.response: If you're still looking for adventure, I hear Mari might be handing them out. She lives in that outpost across the stream.

entries.name: questAccepted
entries.text: Don't hang around me too much. It will arouse suspicion.

entries.name: postQuestIntro
entries.text: Welcome, newcomer! Can I get you something? A drink perhaps? Cheez Fries? (*lowers voice*) maybe a quest?

children.name: nextQuest
children.text: A quest? Yes, let's try that one!
children.response: You've probably already seen the Help Wanted book. Well, Old Zedd here is considered the other "Help Wanted book." Farmer Ham says you have some skills.

children.name: skills
children.text: Oh, I don't know. It was just a couple pieces of fruit...
children.response: Ah, modesty. That can take you places. Well, I've caught wind of something. An old blue rock was stolen and is supposedly hidden not far from the port.

children.name: bluerock
children.response: Yes, Old Zedd here would be more than happy to pay handsomely for its, uh, quiet return. Find the "Lapis Lazuli of Light" and bring it back here. Quietly!

children.name: where
children.response: It's likely to be down in the mines, just outside of Southport. Head to one of the smaller, outdoor entrances. There should be a ladder there.

children.name: reject
children.text: That sounds a bit beyond my abilities
children.response: It's not. Just take the quest. Here.

children.name: where2
children.response: It's likely to be down in the mines, just outside of Southport. Head to one of the smaller, outdoor entrances. There should be a ladder there. Good luck.
